overview: Comedy adventure based on a Jules Verne novel about the ups and downs of jewel thieves in the wilds of Africa circa 1900. George Segal is the appealing hero-heel and Ursula Andress is visually stunning as the lady in the proceedings. Orson Welles has a small role.
tagline: They search for The Southern Star the world's most prized diamond . . . as Africa explodes with a thousand surprises!
title: The Southern Star
